Uses of Interface
domino_project.DominoLine

  • Packages that use DominoLine 
    Package Description
    domino_project  

    • Uses of DominoLine in domino_project

      Classes in domino_project that implement DominoLine 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  BasicDominoLine
      This class represents the 'basic' DominoLine according to the idea: matching side of tiles means adding to Line.
      class  CardinalDominoLine
      This class represents a Specific DominLine used in CardinalGame of DominoGame according to its rules.
      Fields in domino_project declared as DominoLine 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      protected DominoLine Board.line
      Line on where tiles are put on by players.
      Methods in domino_project that return DominoLine 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      DominoLine Board.getLine()
      Returns the DominoLine
      Methods in domino_project with parameters of type DominoLine 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void Board.placeTileToLine(Tile tile, int choice, DominoLine l)
      This method does the same as the upper method but gets on more parameter to do the required type casting.
      void UserInterface.showLine(DominoLine line)
      Shows the tiles of a specified DominoLine.
